item.title: End NV-172 West at I-11/US-93/Bus. US-93
item.description: End NV-172 West at I-11/US-93/Bus. US-93 junction. Turn left for I-11/US-93 (Exit 2); continue straight for Bus. US-93

item.title: End NV-172 West at I-11/US-93/Bus. US-93
item.description: End NV-172 West at I-11/US-93/Bus. US-93. Continue straight for Bus. US-93 to Lake Mead and Boulder City. Turn left for I-11/US-93 for Las Vegas and Kingman (Arizona).

item.title: End NV-564 West at I-11/I-215
item.description: End NV-564 West at I-11/I-215 junction. Merge right for I-11/US-93/US-95 south. Continue west for I-215 west.

item.title: NV-564 West at I-11/I-215/I-515
item.description: Entrance ramp to I-515/US-93/US-95 North to Las Vegas and I-11/US-93/US-95 South to Boulder City. End of NV-564 (Lake Mead Pkwy) west and begin of I-215 westbound.

item.title: NV-564 West Approaching I-11/I-515/I-215/US-93/US-95
item.description: NV-564 West (Lake Mead Parkway) approaching I-11/I-515/I-215/US-93/US-95 in Henderson.

item.title: NV-564 West Approaching I-515/US-93/US-95 North
item.description: NV-564 West Approaching I-515/US-93/US-95 North to Las Vegas

item.title: I-11 North - Exits 22 and Exit 62
item.description: I-11 north approaching Exit 22 - I-215 West/NV-564/Lake Mead Parkway. Approaching I-515 Exit 62 - Auto Show Drive. This is the north end of I-11. US-93 and US-95 join I-515 northbound. I-515 begins here northbound.

item.title: I-11 North - Exit 22
item.description: I-11 North approaching Exit 23 - I-215 West/NV-564 East/Lake Mead Parkway

item.title: I-11 North - Exit 17B
item.description: I-11 north at Exit 17B - Boulder Highway (NV-582)

item.title: I-11 North - Exit 15A
item.description: I-11 north at Exit 15A - Railroad Pass Casino Road

item.title: US-95 North at I-11/US-93
item.description: US-95 North at I-11/US-93 (Exit 14) in Boulder City. Merge right for I-11/US-93/US-95 north onramp. US-95 joins US-93 north to I-15 in Las Vegas.

item.title: US-95 North at I-11/US-93/NV-173
item.description: US-95 North at I-11/US-93/US-95 North/Henderson/Las Vegas. Continue north for NV-173 to Bus. US-93/Boulder City.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching I-11/US-93
item.description: US-95 North approaching I-11/US-93 in Boulder City.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching I-11/US-93 North
item.description: US-95 North approaching I-11/US-93 North to Henderson and Las Vegas (Exit 14).

item.title: US-95 North Approaching I-11/US-93 South
item.description: US-95 North approaching I-11/US-93 South (Exit 14) to Kingman (Arizona)

item.title: End NV-173 South at I-11/US-93/US-95 North
item.description: End NV-173 South at I-11/US-93/US-95 North (Exit 14) onramp. Roadway turns into US-95 southbound.

item.title: End NV-173 South at I-11/US-93/US-95
item.description: End NV-173 South at I-11/US-93/US-95 in Boulder City. Use I-11/US-93/US-95 north for Las Vegas; use I-11/US-93 South for Kingman (Arizona); use US-95 south for Searchlight.

item.title: I-11 North - Exit 2 Offramp
item.description: I-11 north at Exit 2 offramp. Merge left for NV-172 to Hoover Dam. Merge right for Bus. US-93 North to Boulder City and Lake Mead.

item.title: I-11 North - Exit 2
item.description: I-11 north approaching Exit 2 - Bus. US-93/Boulder City

item.title: I-11 North - Distance Marker / Pacific Time
item.description: First distance marker on I-11 north in Nevada. Distance to Henderson and Las Vegas. Entering Pacific Time Zone.

item.title: I-11 North/US-93 North
item.description: First I-11 North/US-93 North shield northbound in Nevada. This is the beginning of I-11 northbound.

item.title: I-11 South - Exit 2
item.description: I-11 south at Exit 2 - US-93 Business/Boulder City. Access to Hoover Dam. This is the last exit on I-11 southbound in Nevada.

item.title: I-11 South - Exit 2
item.description: I-11 south approaching Exit 2 - Bus. US-93/Boulder City

item.title: I-11 South - Exit 14
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 14 - US-95 South/Boulder City/Searchlight. US-95 south leaves I-11/US-93 here. Northbound US-95 joins US-93 north to I-15.

item.title: I-11 South - Boulder City Next Exit
item.description: I-11 south approaching Exit 14. Use Exit 14 for Boulder City. Next exit is 12 miles.

item.title: I-11 South - Exit 15B
item.description: I-11 south approaching Exit 15B - Bus. US-93/Boulder City Parkway. I-11/US-93/US-95 continues south towards Kingman (Arizona).

item.title: I-11 South - Exit 15A
item.description: I-11 south approaching Exit 15A - Railroad Pass Casino Road

item.title: I-11 South - Exit 17
item.description: I-11 south approaching Exit 17 - Wagonwheel Drive/Nevada State Drive.

item.title: I-11 South - Exit 19
item.description: I-11 south at Exit 19 - College Drive

item.title: I-11 South - Exit 19
item.description: I-11 south approaching Exit 19 - College Drive

item.title: I-11 South - Exit 20
item.description: I-11 south approaching Exit 20 - Horizon Drive

item.title: I-11/US-93/US-95 South - Henderson
item.description: I-11/US-93/US-95 South in Henderson. This is the first I-11 shield southbound and one of the few containing the text NEVADA.

item.title: End I-215 East at I-515/I-11
item.description: End I-215 East at I-515/I-11 in Henderson. Use Exit 1 for I-11/US-93/US-95 South/Boulder City and I-515/US-93/US-95 North/Las Vegas. Roadway becomes NV-564/Lake Mead Parkway.

item.title: End I-215 East - Exit 1
item.description: I-215 east approaching Exit 1 - I-515/US-93/US-95/Las Vegas and I-11/US-93/US-95/Boulder City. This is the east end of I-215. The roadway continues as Lake Mead Parkway/NV-564.

item.title: I-215 East Approaching Exit 1
item.description: I-215 east approaching Exit 1 - I-11/US-93/US-95 South/Boulder City and I-515/US-93/US-95 North/Las Vegas. Freeway ends after Exit 1 and roadway becomes NV-564/Lake Mead Parkway
